title: Episode #1 - What Is 'Cognitive Dissonance Theory'?
description:
A New Series called 'Knowledge Bites' where I talk about some of the models, concepts and theories that have captured my attention whilst reading that I have reviewed. 

In this week's episode I will be giving an introduction into 'Cognitive Dissonance Theory'.

---
